title: Diana: amputee
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cancer - Surgery

Hobbies, Recreation & Sport/Sports for the physically handicapped
description: A delightful study of a young girl who underwent a leg amputation because of a cancerous tumour. Shows how she learnt to cope with her disability and adjusted to her surroundings learning to ski on one leg at Darby Dogue Farm, Concord, Massachusetts.
